work-item.field:
Lets assume we have a complex change request and we need to document our changes and impact analysis for our customer.
  • Create a new space with name Change Requests
    Hint: Select Documents & Pages in your navigation bar 
  • Add a favorite shortcut for your new space Change Requests

  • Create a new document in space Change Requests and name it Impact Analysis Simple Search Extension
  • Configure your document that all of the following work items are allowed in your document (for all work items title and description should be shown on document):
    • Requirement
    • Task
    • Change Request
    • Test Case

  • Move your change request to your document using work item action menu

  • Add Heading Needed Tasks and move the related task to this chapter.
  • Add Heading Requirements and add references to all affected requirements


    Hint: You can also use Copy&Paste to add a reference to a work item. 
  • Add Heading Test Cases and add references to all affected test cases
  • Add modification for requirement by using work item overwrite option
    Hint: These modified/new requirements can be moved to correct specification document later on and replaced by their reference in our impact analysis document
